Caption: Fig. 1. 3D Globe (left) was the fastest and most accurate of our tested visualisations. Flat maps with curves of height proportional to distance (right) were more accurate but slower than 2D straight lines. Experiments were conducted individually in virtual reality but our motivation for this work is to support future mixed-reality collaborative scenarios like those envisaged in these figures.
